ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: John Kim is just a whip and 2 dragon scales away from his... ... http://www.hotmail.com. Share information about yourself, create your own public profile at
ygData.messageBody:
John Kim is just a whip and 2 dragon scales away from his...


> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 17, 2000 3:13 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
>
>
> Creediki[FoH] just got his Singing Short Sword a few days
> before the patch
> went in. It's pretty damn sweet, and moreso now that it acts
> as a universal
> instrument. He tested it on different songs and found that it is
> substantially less powerful as an instrument than selo'd
> drums or kelin's
> lute, but it still amplifies pretty well. I'm sure someone
> will post some
> stats on how it stacks up verses our normal instruments.
>
> I'm currently 1 white scale away from getting my SSS. We've
> been killing Vox
> weekly, but she has not been very generous with scales. If
> you want to see a
> CRAP loot load, you should have been present yesterday when
> ALL she dropped
> was 4 frozen paladin books. Today she dropped 2 RBB's, a
> bracer, and a
> crystal spear so she kinda made up for that faux pax, but STILL NO
> SCALES...grr...
>
> Oh well. If Shada or anyone else with an SSS posts some
> instrument-tests I'm
> sure we'd all be curious to see how it does. =P
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> 57th Karaoke Singer, Veeshan
>
>
> >From: Stephane Lange <slange@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
> >To: eqbards@egroups.com
> >Subject: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
> >Date: Mon, 2 Oct 2000 10:40:28 +0200
> >
> >
> >It seems that she has been found
> >
> > <<sss_stats[1].jpg>>
> >Singin Short sword
> >Mgic lore no drop
> >1HS 16/26
> >STR+15 DEX+10 STA+10 CHA+15 HP+50 MANA+10 all resists +10
> >Effect : Dance of the blade
> >WT: 2.0
> >Class: BRD
> >Race: ALL
> >Dance of the Blade
> >Increase Attack Speed by 55% (L1)
> >Increase Attack (ATK) by 30 (L1)
> >Increase Strength by 30 (L1)
> >
> >Classes: None
> >
> >Range to Target: 100 feet
> >Area Effect Range: 30 feet
> >
> >Skill: Instantaneous
> >Allowable Targets: Full Group
> >Resistance Check: None
> >
> >Spell Duration: 25 ticks (2.5 minutes)
> >Duration Formula: 3
>
